> 
> BIG CONVOY frowned mightily as he listened to DRILLBIT as well as
> T=
USCON, his optics going from one to the other. "There is only one way
> to =
resolve this." CONVOY said as he looked coolly at DRILLBIT.
> 
> "If there =
is an answer it lies with Leo Prime and he is above us."
> Turning to go up=
 the tunnel began to march upward, MACH KICK and BREAK
> following, the tri=
p upwards far more difficult as the ground sloped up
> sharply.
> 
> Ahead =
of them, echoing down the hall the voices, especially LEO PRIME
> and the o=
thers could be dimly heard, they were perhaps several hundred
> meters away=
, although in these tunnels sound seemed to travel farther.
> 
> Yes it was=
 time to meet.
> 

<NEW>

There was an amused glance over at the roaring TU=
SCON, and DRILL BIt murmured, "Really, Maximal, you should have been a Pred=
acon.  You acn't go half a breem without screaming at someone.."  Audible o=
nly to those paying -close- attention given all of the yelling going around=
 at hte moment.

Listening as the MAXIMALS came down the hole, DRILL BIT, n=
ot yet aware of the slamming trap up top, whispered, "Right ons chedule."

=
Then as the MAXIMALS and possibly teh PREDACONS were coming on down, went t=
o transform and then dig away underground to lie in wait anew.
